Title: Episode 2
Plot: With Den and Hilary flirting behind closed doors, an incident on the ward is all it takes to trigger the blame game. Pippa has good news on her faecal forum paper and the presence of Peter Healy lightens her mood. Paperwork and pragmatism once again prevail as the staff on B4 clockwatch their way through the day.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual themes and disturbing behaviour
Writer: Jo Brand, Vicki Pepperdine, Joanna Scanlan
